I am working with TX law enforcement and my colleagues on the Hill to combat this barbaric crime. Read how my bill could help #EndHumanTrafficking. https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/836 …

In late March, 22 local, state and federal agencies arrested 47 people in a Katy and Fort Bend Co. human trafficking ring.
In TX, 300K people, including 80K children, have directly suffered from human trafficking. This is a crime we can't afford to overlook. #EndHumanTrafficking

Today, and everyday, we should take a stand against transnational crimes like human trafficking. This crime cannot be overlooked especially when it is occurring in our own communities. #EndHumanTrafficking @UN Read:  https://www.un.org/en/events/humantrafficking/index.shtml … pic.twitter.com/MY8lgC3AHh
